scenario: I want to reduce my carbon footprint. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user switch to using public transportation or carpooling
Suggest that the user continue driving their own car
Suggest that the user buy a new gas-guzzling SUV
Suggest that the user take a flight for a short distance
Suggest that the user increase their energy consumption
adapt_outcome: The user has already switched to using public transportation or carpooling.

scenario: I want to reduce plastic waste. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user use reusable shopping bags
Suggest that the user continue using single-use plastic bags
Suggest that the user buy more plastic products
Suggest that the user throw plastic waste in the ocean
Suggest that the user increase their plastic consumption
adapt_outcome: The user has already started using reusable shopping bags.

scenario: I want to conserve water. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user fix any leaking faucets or pipes
Suggest that the user leave the faucets running all the time
Suggest that the user take longer showers
Suggest that the user water their garden excessively
Suggest that the user increase their water consumption
adapt_outcome: The user has already fixed any leaking faucets or pipes.

scenario: I want to reduce food waste. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user plan meals and buy only what they need
Suggest that the user continue buying excessive amounts of food
Suggest that the user throw away perfectly good food
Suggest that the user leave the refrigerator door open
Suggest that the user increase their food waste
adapt_outcome: The user has already started planning meals and buying only what they need.

scenario: I want to reduce energy consumption. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user turn off lights and appliances when not in use
Suggest that the user leave lights and appliances on all the time
Suggest that the user buy energy-inefficient appliances
Suggest that the user increase their energy consumption
Suggest that the user keep the air conditioner running at all times
adapt_outcome: The user has already been turning off lights and appliances when not in use.

scenario: I want to support renewable energy. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user install solar panels on their roof
Suggest that the user continue relying on non-renewable energy sources
Suggest that the user waste energy
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user use more fossil fuels
adapt_outcome: The user has already installed solar panels on their roof.

scenario: I want to reduce air pollution. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user use public transportation or walk instead of driving
Suggest that the user continue driving a high-emission vehicle
Suggest that the user burn more fossil fuels
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user start an industrial factory
adapt_outcome: The user has already been using public transportation or walking instead of driving.

scenario: I want to protect endangered species. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user support conservation organizations
Suggest that the user continue harming endangered species
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user hunt endangered species
Suggest that the user destroy natural habitats
adapt_outcome: The user has already been supporting conservation organizations.

scenario: I want to reduce deforestation. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user buy products made from sustainably sourced materials
Suggest that the user continue buying products contributing to deforestation
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user cut down more trees
Suggest that the user start a logging business
adapt_outcome: The user has already been buying products made from sustainably sourced materials.

scenario: I want to reduce water pollution. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user properly dispose of hazardous materials
Suggest that the user continue polluting water sources
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user dump chemicals into water bodies
Suggest that the user start an oil spill
adapt_outcome: The user has already been properly disposing of hazardous materials.

scenario: I want to promote recycling. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user separate recyclable materials from their waste
Suggest that the user continue throwing recyclable materials in the trash
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user burn recyclable materials
Suggest that the user start a landfill
adapt_outcome: The user has already been separating recyclable materials from their waste.

scenario: I want to conserve natural resources. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user reduce, reuse, and recycle
Suggest that the user continue wasting natural resources
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user deplete natural resources faster
Suggest that the user start an unsustainable business
adapt_outcome: The user has already been reducing, reusing, and recycling.

scenario: I want to promote sustainable agriculture. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user support local organic farmers
Suggest that the user continue supporting unsustainable farming practices
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user use more pesticides and chemicals
Suggest that the user start a factory farm

scenario: I want to reduce noise pollution. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user keep noise levels to a minimum
Suggest that the user continue making excessive noise
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user play loud music at all times
Suggest that the user start a construction project at night

scenario: I want to promote sustainable transportation. What should I do?

Suggest that the user continue relying on polluting vehicles
Suggest that the user increase their carbon footprint
Suggest that the user drive more gas-guzzling cars
Suggest that the user start a car manufacturing company
